full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI SGO NAS CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR BGYID PA'I TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI GSHIN RJE NGAN SNGAGS LE'U BDUN PA'I BZLOG BSGYUR BYED PA'I LUGS SHIN TU DKA' BA'I PHYIR CUD RGYAS PAR BGYIS DGOS ZHES, DZANG JOD CHEN PO CHIN WANG GI'I TSOGS CHEN GYI BLA MA BLO RIG YON TAN LDAN PA PI LIG THU CHOS RJE SENGGE ZHES BYA BAS NAN TAN CHEN PO'I GSUNG GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGO KHRAL DU` `SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BGYIS PA'I NYES PA'I TSOGS CI MCHIS PA RNAMS, BLA MA YI DAM LHA DANG CHOS RGYAL YAB YUM 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA BZOD CING YANGS MDZAD DU GSOL, NGO TSA KHREL YOD 'JIGS RTOG MED PA'I SEMS CAN GYI 'BRAS BUS, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
